ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Geometrically_bounded_wireframe_shape_representation is a type of Geometric_model that represents a shape by wireframe geometry without topology.
A Geometrically_bounded_wireframe_shape_representation contains only points and curves. All unbounded curves shall be explicitly trimmed unless they are closed. The boundaries of the curves shall be defined explicitly by points on the curves and explicit associations between the points and the curves that they bound or by parameter values.
This entity is incompletely modelled in the ARM. Complete specification can be obtained in the definition of the corresponding MIM entity.
